content: - install the addon, importexporttools NG - highlight Local Folders - rightclick and select importexport option to import mbox - locate and select the message file (NOT the msf file) from your old profile and click OK - done
creator: davidsk

content: This sometimes happens when Thunderbird is updated. Other software (antivirus? VPN?) interrupts the process, causing thunderbird's update of the prefs.js file to fail. When this happens, the updates appear in prefs-1.js. On a restart, Thunderbird starts fresh, causing you to reenter email info. exiting thunderbird, locating the prefs-1.js and renaming to prefs.js generally restores everything.
creator: davidsk
